maqras.text: What You have been promised is sheer nonsense
Life is only our worldly life: we live and die, but we will not be resurrected
He is just a man who has invented a lie about God, and We will never believe him
He said, "My Lord, help me because they call me a liar
[God] said, "After a little while, they will surely regret [what they have said]
So the blast justly struck them, and We swept them away like scum. Away then with the oppressive people
After them, We gave rise to new generations
No community can speed up or hold back its appointed destiny

Then We sent Our Messengers in succession. Whenever a messenger came to a community he was invariably rejected, so We destroyed them one after the other, until they became mere tales. Away, then, with the people who do not believe
Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a clear authority
to Pharaoh and his inner circle, but they were an arrogant, haughty people
They said, "Should we believe two human beings like us while their people are serving us
So they called them both liars, and were consequently destroyed
And We gave Moses the Book so that they might be guided
And We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign, and sheltered them within a hill where there was a meadow and a flowing spring
[God said], "O Messengers, eat good things and do good. I know all that you do
This community of yours is one community, and I am your Lord, so be ever conscious of Me
Yet [your followers] tore their unity piece by piece, each faction rejoicing in what it has
So, leave them in their confusion for a while
Do they think that We provide them wealth and children
because We rush to give them good things? No, but they are oblivious [to what is going on]
Those who stand in awe of their Lord
who believe in the messages of their Lord
who do not associate anything with their Lord
and who give whatever they can while their hearts tremble at the thought that they will be returning to their Lord
these are the ones who vie to do good deeds, and they will be the first to attain them
We do not burden any soul with more than it can bear. There is a record with Us which speaks the Truth and they will not be treated unjustly
However, the [unbelievers'] hearts are in confusion about this [message], and they do even do worse deeds
until We bring those corrupted with opulence for punishment. Only then will they suddenly start crying [to God] for help
Do not cry out today. You will not get any help from Us
For [every time] My verses were recited to you, you turned away from them
in arrogance, amusing yourself by talking nonsense about them far into the night
Have they not thought about what We tell them, or has something come to them that did not come to their forefathers
Or do they not recognize their messenger? Is that why they do not acknowledge him
Or do they say, "He is crazy?" when in fact he brought them the Truth. But most of them hate the Truth
If the Truth conformed to their desires, truly, the heavens, and the earth, and whoever is in them would have been corrupted. Instead, We have given them their Reminder, but they turn away from it
Or [do they think that] you are asking them for compensation, when your Lord's compensation is best? He is the Best of Providers
You call them to a straight path
but those who do not believe in the Hereafter deviate from that path
